review: Need a bigger screen to view a Prime movie? Want to access all your Amazon files? Music, photos, etc. FIRE STICK is the answer--a gadget for a hdmi slot on your tv plus a simple controller that opens new viewing vistas. Requires wifi and an accessible electric outlet. The Stick is my candidate for Amazon's bargain of the year.
author: E.C. Norton

review: I love it.  It was easy to set up and easy to watch movies.  A great item.  Only one problem.  When the Fire Stick is connected it interferes with my regular TV viewing, so I have to unplug it.  I've read other Samsung owners have the same problem.  Other than that I am really glad I bought it.
author: D Dunn "Old Dave"

review: I bought 2 firesticks.  They work real well on amazon prime movies. But then I subscribed to netflix and thats when the trouble started.  The picture on netflix would start breaking up and tiling.  Amazon told me it was my internet connection but as I get 40 mbps, I did not think this was true.  So I went out and bought a Roku 3 just to see if it was my internet connection or the firestick itself.  On the Roku, netflix and everything else streams perfectly.  Do not buy this piece of crap.  Get a Roku.  You won't be sorry.
author: David Strauss

review: I have both the fire tv and now the stick. If you are not into gaming the stick is all you need! Don't waste your money on a smart tv. Get yourself a stick.
